# init(title:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new structured location with the specified title.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(title: String)
```

## Parameters

- **title**: The title of the location.

## Return Value

The structured location object.

## Related Documentation

- **Calendar and Reminders Programming Guide**

## Creating Structured Locations

- **init(mapItem:)**: Creates a new structured location with the specified map item.

items.description: Creates a new structured location with the specified map item.
items.name: init(mapItem:)

title: init(title:)
